entry.title: SNOWFALL WARNING , Williams Lake
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 00:12 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Light Snow, -6.7°C
entry.summary:
Observed at: Williams Lake Airport 01:00 AM PST Sunday 26 February 2023
Condition: Light Snow
Temperature: -6.7°C
Pressure / Tendency: 99.5 kPa falling
Visibility: 8.1 km
Humidity: 92 %
Wind Chill: -12
Dewpoint: -7.8°C
Wind: ESE 14 km/h
Air Quality Health Index: 3

entry.title: Saturday night: Snow. Low minus 9.
entry.summary: Snow. Amount 5 to 10 cm except 15 cm near the Cariboo mountains. Wind southeast 30 km/h gusting to 50 becoming light overnight. Low minus 9. Wind chill near minus 14. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Periods of snow. High minus 3.
entry.summary: Periods of snow ending in the afternoon then a mix of sun and cloud. Amount 5 cm. Wind becoming west 20 km/h in the afternoon. High minus 3. Wind chill minus 14 in the morning and minus 6 in the afternoon. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Partly cloudy. Low minus 11.
entry.summary: Partly cloudy. Wind west 20 km/h becoming light in the evening. Low minus 11. Wind chill near minus 13. Forecast issued 4:00 PM PST Saturday 25 February 2023
